text: Steve Knowlton (August 3, 1922 - October 1, 1998) was an American alpine skier. He competed in three events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Steve Knowlton
